Unoccupied time during one POWERLINK cycle [µs]
ERRD (DS402): Standardized error code (last recorded fault)
FROD (DS402): Speed reference after ramp [rpm] (value for PWM control)
RFR: Actual output frequency value [0.1 Hz] (encoderless estimation)
